verses.esv: 42 You shall make for them linen undergarments to cover their naked flesh. They shall reach from the hips to the thighs;
verses.kjv: 42 And thou shalt make them linen breeches to cover their nakedness; from the loins even unto the thighs they shall reach:
verses.niv: 42 "Make linen undergarments as a covering for the body, reaching from the waist to the thigh.

verses.esv: 13:1 Thus says the LORD to me, “Go and buy a linen loincloth and put it around your waist, and do not dip it in water.”
verses.kjv: 1 Thus saith the LORD unto me, Go and get thee a linen girdle, and put it upon thy loins, and put it not in water.
verses.niv: 1 This is what the LORD said to me: "Go and buy a linen belt and put it around your waist, but do not let it touch water."

verses.esv: 18 I counsel you to buy from me gold refined by fire, so that you may be rich, and white garments so that you may clothe yourself and the shame of your nakedness may not be seen, and salve to anoint your eyes, so that you may see.
verses.kjv: 18 I counsel thee to buy of me gold tried in the fire, that thou mayest be rich; and white raiment, that thou mayest be clothed, and that the shame of thy nakedness do not appear; and anoint thine eyes with eyesalve, that thou mayest see.
verses.niv: 18 I counsel you to buy from me gold refined in the fire, so you can become rich; and white clothes to wear, so you can cover your shameful nakedness; and salve to put on your eyes, so you can see.

verses.esv: 18 They shall have linen turbans on their heads, and linen undergarments around their waists. They shall not bind themselves with anything that causes sweat.
verses.kjv: 18 They shall have linen bonnets upon their heads, and shall have linen breeches upon their loins; they shall not gird themselves with any thing that causeth sweat.
verses.niv: 18 They are to wear linen turbans on their heads and linen undergarments around their waists. They must not wear anything that makes them perspire.
